author: Jon Antal
comment: Nice watch face. After install on phone I found it would only install on watch when it gets on the charger. It would be nice if the "time to ambient" had an option between default and ten seconds as the default 3-4 seconds is too short and 10 is too long.

author: Dale Hubbard
comment: Great face. Great ambient mode. Super control panel with lots of options. Not a battery hog. Installed in a few seconds on my LG Urbane 2. Kudos to the developer!

author: Michael W
comment: 😎👍 Great on Android Wear 2. You have to wait a couple minutes or so for download prompt on the watch after phone install. Works flawlessly. (swipe up to see prompt/progress) Also it's awesome being able to change the color of the LED background. This is definitely one of the best watch faces on the market. 🤔 Although it would be great if we could have custom color for our ambient, not sure why it still has preset colours only. Maybe they could at least add orange

author: Donald Prange
comment: I love this watchface.  I had to reset my gear 2.  I have installed and uninstalled the watchface multiple times and it never syncs to the app so I can use the watchface.
title: Great Watch Face when you can get it to install

author: Mihai Crangeanu
comment: My favorite watch face. Application works perfectly on LG G Watch R running Wear 2.0, you just need to install it on watch using Google Play from the watch itself not only on the phone. You can see the apps installed just on phone by scrolling down in Google Play App screen on watch or probably by searching it.

author: Peter Mortensen
comment: Doesn't show as a watch face in Android Wear 2 after installation. LG G Watch R.

author: Ujjal Das
comment: Good .....
title: Ujjal Das

author: FaultBat
comment: My go-to watch face. Exactly what I want, nothing more to say!

author: David Richards
comment: I use this face most of the time

author: D. Le
comment: Clean and straightforward, yet very eye catching, especially on my LG G Watch R.
title: One Of My Favorite Watch Faces.

author: Steve Hadlick
comment: Love this watch face but it goes through about 10% battery per hour. I had to uninstall. Usually get about 3% on my Moto 360
title: Nice to look at

author: Neil Young
comment: Missing the option to set the  background colour. Add this option and it would be a five star rating all the way. This face keeps getting better . the option to see temp reading would be cool . hint hint )

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've updated the app and now you can choose LED color.
Would you please check the latest version.
Thanks.

title: Improvment needed

author: Sean Steven Abalayan
comment: I had to get this for my G Watch R when I first saw it because it reminded me of my old Casio Digital watch. The fit for the round screen is perfect. Plus, the option to change the LED screen color for active and ambient modes (cyan or yellow truly delivers the nostalgia home, IMO), as well as lower the brightness to reduce the risk of pesky burn-in sells the app for me. Now it's a mainstay for my watch, along with my PIPBoy and my formal analog watchface. Worth every cent.
title: Pure Nostalgia

author: Carl Curtis
comment: The display looks good and is easy to read.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've updated the app and now you can choose the Date format.
Would you please check the latest version.
Thanks.

author: Mindaugas N
comment: Best watch face!
title: LG G Watch R - Mindia

author: Ruskin Hardie
comment: Very elegant design. Only annoyance is that it uses the month-day format instead of either the regional settings of your phone or as a customisable setting of the app. UPDATE - quite correct, the latest version allows a day-month format. Great stuff...

author: Chad Man
comment: My favorite watch face. Now with choice of color it's even better :-)
title: Awesome!

author: Adam Vera
comment: Nice watch face

author: Adam Ornelles
comment: If you have any doubt about this watch face you shouldn't. It is very good with battery life and if anything helps prolong life. Very easy to customize in menu.
title: Great

author: Hadi Bin Sumaida
comment: Love it but was dispointed that there was no drawing for ambient mode (same as ur f04 watch) however m not refunding as i kno ull add that feature in an update soon cheers
title: Amazing retro

author: Charlemagne Tan
comment: Been looking for this watch face!
title: Sleek and intuitive.

author: Karim Elessawy
comment: Love it, one of the best, and everything is configurable too
title: Awsome

comment: Would be good if you could change the colour for the normal mode.

comment: Would get 5 stars if could change date format to day/month and if weather could be added. Update: Developer added date format! Now 5 stars!

title: Great looking

author: nick price
comment: Wow what a update this is the best screen by far for the lg g watch r top job guys
title: Awesome screen now you can change the colour

author: Scott Jensen
comment: The color choices are good, customization settings are excellent. Face indicators for airplane, no connectivity, silence, etc do not follow color system and are out of place.
title: Good concept, bad for OLED

author: Mark L
comment: The watch face is nice and clean with no distracting or irrelevant information. The choice of colours in ambient mode is also very good.
title: Really nice :)

author: Donny Rogers
comment: This would be even better if I could choose always color mode in ambient mode like most the other watch faces can form this app maker.
title: Good but...

author: Ian Peters
comment: Will not show connection to LG g watch r

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Is your wear's version 5.0 or above ?
If not,please update the firmware of your watch.
For more questions, plz feel free to contact us.We can give you a help.Thank you.

title: Not happy

comment: Would be great if you could choose background colour,  and date format.

title: Not quite there

title: NOT user friendly!!!

author: Dee best Jiles
comment: I like it on my LG watch R
title: Cool.

author: Simon Marshall
comment: ...I had a watch like this when I was a kid.
title: Love this...

author: Lee Yik Wei
comment: Really love the design.
title: Cool

author: Darren Creese
comment: Great looking watch face
title: Love it

author: Pranav Kaushal
comment: This is by far my favorite watchface, in my 3 days of using it, it has crashed a couple of times. I would however guess it wasn't the watchface as I have been using my watch quite heavily. All in all, impressed
title: Very impressed

author: douggie marsh
comment: Need to test latest update. But battery drain is bad. Apart from that its a nice looking watchface with a nice app..
title: Battery

author: Afram Kirmiz
comment: The watch constantly reverts from this to the default face.  Have this problem with other faces from the same developer (not with other developers though)
title: Constantly crashing on g watch r

comment: It looks great. But hate the ambient mode
title: Good but

author: Michael Gindhart
comment: Bureaux makes the best faces! Look great and work perfect no crashes yet on any face!  (Note edge & LG g watch r )
title: Awesome!
